page.title: 02Family Life South of Oakley
page.content: Most{families}in our area have three children and a Mum and Dad. Nearly as many have two children. Most people live in a{detached house}with three or four bedrooms. It's fashionable to add double glazed windows, central heating , extra bathrooms, fitted kitchens and home extensions. Often both mum and dad have a{car}and our houses have double garages. Most of the{dads work} in Basingstoke, usually travelling to work by car. A few dads work in London, Reading, Andover, Tadley or Oakley. Many{mums work}either full time or part time, most of them in Basingstoke or Oakley. Nearly every home has a television and a telephone. Many have a video recorder and a home computer. It is quite usual for a family to have a cat or dog as a pet. Often people live in{Oakley}because {} {Basingstoke}is too large and crowded.
